summary: Overall, you're in a strong early-game position. Focus on generating steady income with quick-turnaround crops while investing in key items for mid-game scaling.

sections.title: Immediate Actions
sections.summary: These are high-priority tasks you should focus on right now for the biggest immediate impact.
points: Plant all your remaining Carrot seeds. They offer the best gold-per-minute ratio among your current items.
Sell your stock of Strawberries. While they are good, your current gold allows you to buy more profitable seeds.
Consider buying a 'Small Sprinkler' if available. It will save you significant time and energy daily.

sections.title: Mid-term Goals
sections.summary: Look ahead! These goals will set you up for success in the next phase of the game.
points: Save up 5,000 gold to unlock the 'Advanced Tools' upgrade. This is a critical power spike.
Try to obtain Blueberries. They are a multi-harvest crop that will become your primary source of passive income.
Complete the 'First Harvest' quest, which rewards you with a rare seed pack.

sections.title: Hidden Potential
sections.summary: Don't overlook these opportunities! They might not be obvious but can provide a unique advantage.
points: You own an Orange Tulip. While not profitable to sell, planting it near a beehive (if you get one) can produce rare 'Tulip Honey'.

sections.title: Warnings & Alerts
sections.summary: Be careful! These are potential risks or inefficiencies in your current strategy.
points: Avoid buying more Strawberry seeds for now. The profit margin is too low compared to other available options.
Your inventory is nearing its limit. Selling some lower-tier items can free up valuable space.
